name: Killer is Dead  - Nightmare Edition
description: Added DX11 compatibility. FPS cap increased from 30 to 60. The default resolution is now 1080p.
content:
files:
- unlockfps: https://github.com/Zeioth/zeioth-lutris/raw/master/game-installers/killer-is-dead/kid-unlockfps-0.0.2.zip
game:
  appid: 261110
  args: -d3d11
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet45
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/KidGame/Config/
    file: unlockfps
    format: zip
- task:
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    app: win7
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: '1'
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  esync: true
  dxvk: true
